title: Mobile Inquiry Learning Course for College Students with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and basic social studies concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Step-by-step inquiry learning support for university students with intellectual disabilities at vocational training institutions, using mobile devices. Content is structured around socially relevant themes applicable to daily life and workplace scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to generate questions related to social phenomena with 80% accuracy and establish a step-by-step inquiry plan.
Learners will be able to use digital tools to visually represent (e.g., infographics) the causes and solutions of a given social issue (e.g., community recycling system).
Learners will be able to produce a 5-minute presentation video of their final inquiry results, incorporating feedback from peers and instructors.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
